dict.acceptation: 潜在的，有可能的；[语法学]可能语气的，表示可能性的；有能力的；
潜力，潜能；[物]电位，势能；潜能的事物；[语]可能语气；

sent.orig: The key of the arisen surface-potential-based models is to calculate the surface potential accurately.
sent.trans: 在基于表面势的(surface-potential-based)模型中，准确求解表面势是一个关键问题。

sent.orig: On the origins of self-potential (SP) anomalies induced by water injections into geothermal reservoirs.
sent.trans: 通过把水注射到地下水库引起的self-potential(SP)异常的由来。

sent.orig: Potential is general trend, middle potential or small potential.
Soil matric potential, leaf potential and atmosphere water potential is diversity in temporal and spatial variation.
sent.trans: 通过相关性分析得出土壤基质势，叶水势，大气水势三者在时间和空间上都有很大的差别。

sent.orig: Electric potential is the potential energy of electrons at a certain point.
sent.trans: 电势表示的是电子在某点的势能。
